definition: without qualification, any of various plants of various genera of the family Compositae having flowers that can be dried without loss of form or color
details:
adjective
- without qualification
= synonyms: stark
- continuing forever or indefinitely
= synonyms: perpetual
noun
- any of various plants of various genera of the family Compositae having flowers that can be dried without loss of form or color
= synonyms: everlasting flower
